data.title: The Score with Edmund Stone
data.meta_description: Produced by All Classical Public Media in Portland, Oregon, The Score with Edmund Stone is a weekly celebration of music in film.
data.text:
Join the pack as Edmund brings you music from movies about our furry friends, including The Call of the Wild, Secret Life of Pets, The Peanuts Movie, As Good As It Gets and more.

Escape from the ordinary this week on a wave of adventure. Edmund brings you music of island-themed films, from the famous Treasure Island to the pirates of Cutthroat Island and the dark and stormy secrets of Shutter Island.
